languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт едва кивает. На ее лице клубятся трудноразличимые эмоции.{/n} "Твои слова, элантах — то, что еще дает мне надеж..."
{n}Yrliet gives you a barely visible nod. Her face is clouded with emotion, but you cannot read her expression.{/n} "Your words, elantach — they are something that still gives me ho—"
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт едва кивает. На ее лице клубятся трудноразличимые эмоции.{/n} "Твои слова, элантах — то, что еще дает мне надеж..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a barely visible nod. Her face is clouded by indiscernible emotions.{/n} "You words, elantach — something that still gives me ho..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特几不可察地点了点头。她情绪激动，但你看不出来她在激动什么。{/n}“你的这些话，外界人——我仍然相——”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a barely visible nod. Her face is clouded with emotion, but you cannot read her expression.{/n} "Your words, elantach — they are something that still gives me ho—"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特几不可察地点了点头。她情绪激动，但你看不出来她在激动什么。{/n}“你的这些话，外界人——我仍然相——”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet hace un gesto de asentimiento casi imperceptible con la cabeza. Su rostro está nublado por la emoción, pero eres incapaz de interpretar su expresión.{/n} «Tus palabras, elantach... lo que dices todavía me infunde esperanz...».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a barely visible nod. Her face is clouded with emotion, but you cannot read her expression.{/n} "Your words, elantach — they are something that still gives me ho—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet hace un gesto de asentimiento casi imperceptible con la cabeza. Su rostro está nublado por la emoción, pero eres incapaz de interpretar su expresión.{/n} «Tus palabras, elantach... lo que dices todavía me infunde esperanz...».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un hochement de tête quasi imperceptible. Son visage exprime une émotion que vous ne parvenez pas à reconnaître.{/n} « Vos paroles, elantach... Elles me permettent de garder coura... »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a barely visible nod. Her face is clouded with emotion, but you cannot read her expression.{/n} "Your words, elantach — they are something that still gives me ho—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un hochement de tête quasi imperceptible. Son visage exprime une émotion que vous ne parvenez pas à reconnaître.{/n} « Vos paroles, elantach... Elles me permettent de garder coura... »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet nickt kaum sichtbar. Ihr Gesicht ist voller Emotionen, die du aber nicht deuten kannst.{/n} "Eure Worte, Elantach ... sie geben mir immer noch Hoff..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a barely visible nod. Her face is clouded with emotion, but you cannot read her expression.{/n} "Your words, elantach — they are something that still gives me ho—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet nickt kaum sichtbar. Ihr Gesicht ist voller Emotionen, die du aber nicht deuten kannst.{/n} "Eure Worte, Elantach ... sie geben mir immer noch Hoff..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはかろうじてわかる程度にうなずく。彼女の顔は感情で曇っているが、その表情を読み取ることはできない。{/n}「エランタ、お前の言葉は…今でも我に…」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a barely visible nod. Her face is clouded with emotion, but you cannot read her expression.{/n} "Your words, elantach — they are something that still gives me ho—"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはかろうじてわかる程度にうなずく。彼女の顔は感情で曇っているが、その表情を読み取ることはできない。{/n}「エランタ、お前の言葉は…今でも我に…」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, belli belirsiz bir şekilde başını sallıyor. Yüzü duygu dolu olsa da ifadesinin ne anlama geldiğini çıkaramıyorsun.{/n} "Sözlerin elantach. Bana umut vermeye..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet gives you a barely visible nod. Her face is clouded with emotion, but you cannot read her expression.{/n} "Your words, elantach — they are something that still gives me ho—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, belli belirsiz bir şekilde başını sallıyor. Yüzü duygularla kaplı ama ifadesinin ne anlama geldiğini çıkaramıyorsun.{/n} "Senin sözlerin elantach. Bana umut veren..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
